      • setDataRate

        public DataSourceMetaData.Builder setDataRate(int sampleNo,
                                              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets the DATA_RATE key to the appropriate value based on the given TimeUnit.
        Parameters:
        sampleNo - Number of samples.
        timeUnit - Standard Java TimeUnit object. Can be DAYS, HOURS, MINUTES, SECONDS, MILLISECONDS, MICROSECONDS, and NANOSECONDS.
        Returns:
        The modified Builder.
